title: Don’t Fall For The Trap Coming (Ep 1226)
description:
In this episode, I address the stunning,
new, declassified information which will have John Brennan in a panic. I also address new information about the troubling origins of the Wuhan Virus. Finally, I address The NY Times attempts to rewrite their own story about troubling allegations against Joe Biden. 

News Picks:


The petition to have the tyrannical Governor of Michigan recalled is exploding. 

The fake news NY Times stealth edits a Joe Biden story about an alleged sexual assault. 

There are some golden nuggets in the declassified FISA IG report footnotes.


This 2018 Jeff Carlson article has some interesting information about John Brennan.

Did the Wuhan Virus come from a Chinese lab?

The potential for fraud in mail-in voting is enormous. 


More police-state BS.
